data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Leicester in the half of Arsenal.
In the minute 2, Leicester are coming forward and James Maddison gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
Can Leicester get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Arsenal.
In London, Arsenal push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Craig Pawson signals a Leicester throw-in in Arsenal's half.
In the minute 5, Leicester to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Leicester.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 8, Leicester to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
Leicester will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Arsenal.
Arsenal drive upfield and Granit Xhaka gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leicester defender.
In the minute 11, Hector Bellerin (Arsenal) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 12, Arsenal's Bukayo Saka gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Leicester defender.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Goal kick for Leicester at Emirates Stadium.
Arsenal have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 17, Leicester needs to be cautious. Arsenal have an attacking throw-in.
Leicester awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Craig Pawson awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 20, Can Arsenal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leicester's half?
In London Arsenal drive forward through Bukayo Saka. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In London, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Arsenal) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 22, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
In the minute 27, Throw-in Leicester.
Craig Pawson signals a throw-in for Arsenal, close to Leicester's area.
In London, Alexandre Lacazette of Arsenal is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 30, Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
Free kick Leicester.
Hector Bellerin for Arsenal has been booked by Craig Pawson and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Leicester.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Leicester's Christian Fuchs has been booked in London.
In the minute 33, Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wesley Fofana is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Throw-in for Leicester at Emirates Stadium.
In the minute 37, Craig Pawson signals a Arsenal throw-in in Leicester's half.
Leicester's Wesley Fofana looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Arsenal push forward at Emirates Stadium and Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Leicester defence.
In the minute 41, Leicester have a goal kick.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Emirates Stadium, Youri Tielemans has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 42, Bukayo Saka (Arsenal) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Bukayo Saka for Arsenal gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Craig Pawson awards Leicester a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Leicester in their own half.
Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Can Arsenal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leicester's half?
The first-half is over at Emirates Stadium.
The second-half is underway in London.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to David Luiz for Arsenal who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
The home team has substituted David Luiz with Shkodran Mustafi. Mikel Arteta is thus making his first change.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Leicester.
Free kick for Arsenal in the half of Leicester.
Wesley Fofana (Leicester) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 53, Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
Leicester drives forward and James Maddison gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Important block from the Arsenal defence as James Maddison fires in a strike for Leicester.
In the minute 56, Leicester have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
Free kick in a good position for Leicester!
James Maddison of Leicester gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
Alexandre Lacazette (Arsenal) has received a yellow card from Craig Pawson.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
Throw-in for Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 60, The away team replace Dennis Praet with Jamie Vardy.
Craig Pawson awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Arsenal close to the penalty box.
In the minute 63, Goal kick for Leicester at Emirates Stadium.
Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nicolas Pepe is on a sub for Bukayo Saka for Arsenal.
In the minute 67, Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
James Maddison is booked for the away team.
Arsenal's Hector Bellerin gets in a shot on goal at Emirates Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Leicester in the half of Arsenal.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, Jonny Evans (Leicester) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Alexandre Lacazette is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Cengiz Under is replacing Harvey Barnes for the away team.
In the minute 76, Alexandre Lacazette is back on the pitch.
Ball goes out of play for a Leicester goal kick.
Throw-in Arsenal.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
Jamie Vardy heads in to make it 0-1 at Emirates Stadium.
Cengiz Under with an assist there.
In the minute 81, Arsenal make their third substitution with Edward Nketiah replacing Kieran Tierney.
Craig Pawson awards Leicester a goal kick.
Can Arsenal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leicester's half?
In the minute 83, Craig Pawson signals a Arsenal throw-in in Leicester's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Arsenal in London.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 85, Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
The away team have replaced James Maddison with Marc Albrighton. This is the third substitution made today by Brendan Rodgers.
Leicester have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 86, Leicester to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
Craig Pawson signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
Leicester are in shooting range from this free kick.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in London.
Throw-in for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Leicester territory.
Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
Leicester's Jamie Vardy is on target but unsuccessful.
Leicester have been awarded a corner by Craig Pawson.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Craig Pawson blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
Granit Xhaka (Arsenal) has received a first yellow card.
